product_name: REI Venturi Quarter-Zip Top - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: With soft, stretchy moisture-wicking fabric to keep you comfortable on the move, the REI Venturi Quarter-Zip plus-size top also features thoughtful details like thumbholes and a pocket on the sleeve. Knit polyester/spandex blend wicks sweat and offers 4-way stretch for ease of movement; smooth fabric also resists snags. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Thumbholes keep sleeves in place during activity or while layering under gloves or coats; mock neck provides extra coverage and a deep front zipper promotes ventilation. Welded bicep zip pocket. The REI Venturi Quarter-Zip top has a comfortable, easy fit.
short_description: With soft, stretchy moisture-wicking fabric to keep you comfortable on the move, the REI Venturi Quarter-Zip plus-size top also features thoughtful details like thumbholes and a pocket on the sleeve.
